br.span: Versailles Schools building secretaries are available to assist and answer questions from parents and community members. Below is the schedule they are available to be reached.

img.title: Tigers
img.alt: Update from Mr. Moran as of March 17, 2020

div.a: Update from Mr. Moran as of March 17, 2020

br.span: Versailles Schools are committed to supporting our students and community during this unprecedented activity with the COVID-19 pandemic.
Information on how to talk to your children about Covid-19.

img.title: Tigers
img.alt: Versailles Schools Closed from 3:05 pm on March 16 through April 3

div.a: Versailles Schools Closed from 3:05 pm on March 16 through April 3

br.span: As many of you are aware, Ohio Governor Mike DeWine has made a tough decision to close all K-12 schools after classes on Monday, March 16th to assist in the management of COVID-19 (coronavirus).

img.title: Tigers
img.alt: HS Musical Proudly Presents Footloose - TO BE RESCHEDULED

div.a: HS Musical Proudly Presents Footloose - TO BE RESCHEDULED

br.span: The HS Musical "Footloose" will be reschedule for a later date. More details to come.
The 2019-2020 yearbook can be ordered online.

Instant Connect is the school district's one call system for notifying parents and students of school notifications. Parents/guardians can add and/or delete phone numbers and email addresses they want to be notified.
